    WHEN [x.BillDetails].[ProductId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [dtoBillDetail.Product].[CategoryId], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Content], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated1], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[DateModified], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Description], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[HomeFlag], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[HotFlag], [x.BillDetails].[ProductId], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Image], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Name] AS [Name1], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[OriginalPrice], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Price] AS [Price0], CASE

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id1], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[PromotionPrice], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Tags], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Unit], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[ViewCount], [x.BillDetails].[Quantity], CASE

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.BillDetails].[SizeId], [dtoBillDetail.Size].[Name] AS [Name2]
FROM [BillDetails] AS [x.BillDetails]
INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dtoBillDetail.Size] ON [x.BillDetails].[SizeId] = [dtoBillDetail.Size].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product] ON [x.BillDetails].[ProductId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product].[CategoryId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dtoBillDetail.Color] ON [x.BillDetails].[ColorId] = [dtoBillDetail.Color].[Id]

    FROM [Bills] AS [x0]
    ORDER BY [x0].[DateCreated] DESC, [x0].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t] ON [x.BillDetails].[BillId] = [t].[Id]

""SELECT [t].[DateCreated], [t].[Id], [x.BillDetails].[BillId], CASE
    WHEN [x.BillDetails].[ColorId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [dtoBillDetail.Color].[Code], [x.BillDetails].[ColorId], [dtoBillDetail.Color].[Name], [x.BillDetails].[Id] AS [Id0], [x.BillDetails].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x.BillDetails].[ProductId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [dtoBillDetail.Product].[CategoryId], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Content], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated1], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[DateModified], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Description], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[HomeFlag], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[HotFlag], [x.BillDetails].[ProductId], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Image], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Name] AS [Name1], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[OriginalPrice], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Price] AS [Price0], CASE
    WHEN [dtoBillDetail.Product].[CategoryId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id1], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[PromotionPrice], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Tags], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Unit], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[ViewCount], [x.BillDetails].[Quantity], CASE
    WHEN [x.BillDetails].[SizeId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.BillDetails].[SizeId], [dtoBillDetail.Size].[Name] AS [Name2]
FROM [BillDetails] AS [x.BillDetails]
INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dtoBillDetail.Size] ON [x.BillDetails].[SizeId] = [dtoBillDetail.Size].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product] ON [x.BillDetails].[ProductId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product].[CategoryId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dtoBillDetail.Color] ON [x.BillDetails].[ColorId] = [dtoBillDetail.Color].[Id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [x0].[DateCreated], [x0].[Id]

""SELECT [t2].[Id], [t2].[Id0], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Content], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[DateCreated], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[DateModified], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Description], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[HomeFlag], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[HotFlag], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Id] AS [Id1], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Image], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Name], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[OriginalPrice], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Price], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[PromotionPrice], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoAlias], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoDescription], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoKeywords], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Status], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Tags], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[Unit], [x.Product.ProductCategory.Products].[ViewCount]

END, [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id] AS [Id1], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Status], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[PromotionPrice], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Status] AS [Status0], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Tags], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Unit], [dtoBillDetail.Product].[ViewCount], [x.BillDetails].[Quantity], CASE
    WHEN [x.BillDetails].[SizeId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.BillDetails].[SizeId], [dtoBillDetail.Size].[Name] AS [Name2]
FROM [BillDetails] AS [x.BillDetails]
INNER JOIN [Sizes] AS [dtoBillDetail.Size] ON [x.BillDetails].[SizeId] = [dtoBillDetail.Size].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Products] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product] ON [x.BillDetails].[ProductId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory] ON [dtoBillDetail.Product].[CategoryId] = [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Colors] AS [dtoBillDetail.Color] ON [x.BillDetails].[ColorId] = [dtoBillDetail.Color].[Id]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [x0].[DateCreated], [x0].[Id]
    FROM [Bills] AS [x0]
    ORDER BY [x0].[DateCreated] DESC, [x0].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t] ON [x.BillDetails].[BillId] = [t].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[DateCreated] DESC, [t].[Id], [x.BillDetails].[Id], [dtoBillDetail.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)
